metadata.name: NTFS Alternate Data Stream
metadata.comment: Detects writing data into NTFS alternate data streams from powershell. Needs Script Block Logging.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-content')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-content'))) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-stream')))

output.summary: Detects writing data into NTFS alternate data streams from powershell. Needs Script Block Logging.
